Test Case: User can signup with valid email
Steps:
1. Go to /signup
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Sign Up
Expected Result: User account created and redirected to app

Test Case: User can login with valid credentials
Steps:
1. Go to /login
2. Enter email
3. Enter password
4. Click Login
Expected Result: User logged in and redirected to app

Steps:
1. Click user menu
2. Click Logout
Expected Result: User logged out and redirected to home
